title: LolClient.exe Stopped working
body:
{{item:3070}} So, Everytime i go to the Crafting "Shop" my LolClient stops working and i dont know what to do.
I have already "repaired" LOL but stills happening.
It happens every, EVERY, single time i try to enter on it xD
Btw, this just started after this new patch (kled release){{champion:240}}

replies.body: If it helps in the process at all, I noticed that my hextech crafting only crashes on one account. My others don't crash when I enter into hextech crafting. Please fix this quickly. I have 8 key fragments, and I can't seem to drop any more...

We're currently looking into this issue where attempting to launch hextech crashing may cause the client to crash and close out.  In the meantime, updating windows may be able to get this fixed up.  Hopefully, this will work out for you!
